column1: Local Foods////Crispy chicken sandwich - I am one of those people who don't eat chicken. it's a waste of a protein. If you eat meat
column2: don't waste your time with chicken
column3: etc etc. But damn it. I broke one of my fundamental rules and indulged in their chicken sandwich. Â Sweet
column6: juicy all on top of the perfect pretzel roll. Holy sweet mother of corgi
column7: this was the best chicken sandwich I've ever had.Period. End of story. My favorite sandwich in Houston.
